summary: This document is a trading authorization from Deutsche Bank Wealth Management, allowing an agent to buy and sell securities on behalf of the undersigned. It outlines the responsibilities and indemnities associated with the trading activities conducted by the agent.

persons.name: Milk RC
persons.context: Milk RC is authorized as the agent and attorney in fact to manage the trading activities for the undersigned's account.

keyFacts: The document authorizes Milk RC to act on behalf of the undersigned in trading securities.
The undersigned agrees to indemnify Deutsche Bank for any losses arising from the trading activities.
The authorization is a continuing one and remains in effect until revoked by the undersigned.
The document emphasizes that the agent's actions are equivalent to those the undersigned could take themselves.
The document is marked as confidential and is subject to legal protections.
